FinancialDealBid.name: FinancialDealBid
FinancialDealBid.description: Represents the bids placed by financial deal parties in the financial deal.

BidAmount.description: The amount that the financial deal party is willing to pay for the bid.

BidDate.description: The date on which the bid has been placed by the financial deal party.

BidRound.description: The bidding round in which the bid has been placed by the financial deal party.

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal associated with the financial deal bid record.

FinancialDealPartyId.description: The financial deal party who's making the bid.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal bid record.
